column2: This district consists of two subdistricts, RES-25 and RES-10, which will be listed as alternatives in that order for the following dimensional standards.
column8: This district has 3 classes: (1) Municipal sewer and municipal or public water (2) Municipal sewer and individual water (3) Individual sewer and individual, municipal, or public water
column20: All uses and structures shall be subject to flood hazard review as well as all other applicable municipal and state regulations (but does not require a public hearing) except agriculture and forestry, unimproved open space and recreational/ educational uses.
